tasks.name: Achieve Your First Level Up
tasks.description: Level up any of your skills for the first time.

tasks.name: Achieve Your First Level 5
tasks.description: Reach level 5 in any skill (not including Agility, Hitpoints and Runecraft).

tasks.name: Achieve Your First Level 10
tasks.description: Reach level 10 in any skill (not including Agility and Hitpoints).

tasks.name: Receive a Slayer Task
tasks.description: Receive a slayer task from any Slayer Master.

tasks.name: Complete the Gnome Stronghold Agility Course
tasks.description: Complete a lap of the Gnome Stronghold Agility Course.

tasks.name: Complete Room 1 of Pyramid Plunder
tasks.description: Search the Golden Chest in Room 1 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem.

tasks.name: Complete Room 2 of Pyramid Plunder
tasks.description: Search the Golden Chest in Room 2 of Pyramid Plunder in Sophanem.

tasks.name: Complete the Al Kharid Agility Course
tasks.description: Complete a lap of the Al Kharid Rooftop Agility Course.

tasks.name: 1 Wintertodt Kill
tasks.description: Help the pyromancers subdue the Wintertodt.

tasks.name: 25 Wintertodt Kills
tasks.description: Help the pyromancers subdue the Wintertodt 25 times.

tasks.name: 50 Wintertodt Kills
tasks.description: Help the pyromancers subdue the Wintertodt 50 times.

tasks.name: 75 Wintertodt Kills
tasks.description: Help the pyromancers subdue the Wintertodt 75 times.

tasks.name: 100 Wintertodt Kills
tasks.description: Help the pyromancers subdue the Wintertodt 100 times.

tasks.name: Do 15% of the achievements
tasks.description: Complete up to 15% of all the achievements
